text: the fatal gang rape of a young woman in
New Delhi last year was a crime that
gripped all of India and after nearly
nine months four of the men convicted
have been sentenced to death the Delhi
gang-rape
as it's become known brought Indians
together and to increasingly ask why are
women so unsafe outside their homes
responding to the surge of public anger
the government introduced new laws to
address sex crimes and yet reports of
rape and harassment continue to increase
in a recent UN survey nine out of ten
women reported being sexually harassed
in public spaces in New Delhi
but daily life requires venturing out
this is the story of five women who live
in New Delhi their lives are very
different but as they commute by bus
subway even by private car they all know
well the insecurity that accompanies
each day's journey
my name is Neha Menon I am 26 years old
